name: AI 404
description:
In this game you LITTERALLY collabore with the letters A and I !

Please note thoses two known slight game-design flaws:
 - To turn a piece you need to hold it
 - To push a robot out of the lazer, try double tapping

This game save your progress ! Come back to it whenever you want.

Animation, Programming, Level-design by Cypooos

Music and SFX by Twitchywhalez

Character designed by Acid Burritos

Thanks to our playtesters ZipZipW, Antoine and Captain Hope


MOVEMENTS

SPECIALS KEYS

IN PLACEMENT MODE (you need to hold the piece to turn it)

IN PLAY MODE (once you've hit the play button)

 

Please check if it's one of thoses two known slight game-design flaws:
 - To turn a piece you need to hold it
 - To push a robot out of the lazer, try double tapping

Try again, you can do it ! But if you are really stuck, you can watch a playthough here :
